wikipedia_page.main: Joe Mbu (born 14 February 1982) is a Cameroonian retired semi-professional footballer who played as a defender. During his career, which started as a youth player at Hibernian, he played for Whitburn Junior, Cowdenbeath, Stenhousemuir on loan, East Fife and finally, Edinburgh City.

response: Joe Mbu (born 11 November 1983), also known by the nickname of "Big Joe", is a Zairean former professional rugby league footballer and coach. Mbu played for the London Broncos/Harlequins RL in the Super League. He is the current head coach of the London Skolars.
Joe Mbu's usual position was . He also operated on the , and  positions.
In October 2010 London Skolars appointed Joe Mbu as their head coach.Joe Mbu Takes The Reins At Skolars London Skolars, 5 October 2010 now coaches Staines RFC June 2014
Joseph Mbu (born 24 December 1981) is a Nigerian-born English rugby union player who played most recently for US Dax in the Top 14 competition in France. Joe Mbu's position of choice is on the wing.
